notes.note:
Addresses issues with shipping general availability of Microsoft's PlayReady hardware decryption DRM support which was released in Firefox 137. With this change support is now limited to specific web sites, while we continue to test more general availability. ([Bug 1959827][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1959827

Fixed file picker not being displayed when exporting passwords on macOS in about:logins for some users. ([Bug 1956266][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1956266

Fixed accessibility issues with the new PDF signature feature. (Bugs [1956110][1], [1952571][2])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1956110
  [2]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1952571

system_requirements:
## Windows

### Operating Systems (32-bit and 64-bit)
 - Windows 10 or later

### Recommended Hardware
-  1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster compatible processor or System on a Chip (SoC)
-  1GB of RAM / 2GB of RAM for the 64-bit version
-  500MB of hard drive space

---

## Mac

### Operating Systems
- macOS 10.15 or later

### Recommended Hardware
- Macintosh computer with an Intel x86 or Apple silicon processor
- 512 MB of RAM
- 200 MB hard drive space

---

## GNU/Linux

### Software Requirements

*Please note that GNU/Linux distributors may provide packages for your distribution which have different requirements.*

- Firefox will not run at all without the following libraries or packages:
    - glibc 2.17 or higher
    - GTK+ 3.14 or higher
    - libglib 2.42 or higher
    - libstdc++ 4.8.1 or higher
    - X.Org 1.0 or higher (1.7 or higher is recommended)
- For optimal functionality, we recommend the following libraries or packages:
    - DBus 1.0 or higher
    - NetworkManager 0.7 or higher
    - PulseAudio
title: Firefox 137.0.2 Release
